title: Ex-Labour adviser tells Keir Starmer WHEN he should resign as pressure mounts on PM: 'I would like to see him go!'
tags: As GB News Political Editor Christopher Hope asked Mr Lammy;Nigel Farage says Keir Starmer will be gone by end of the month as he sticks boot in: ‘Game’s up!’;Labour councillor delivers bleak verdict for Keir Starmer as Cabinet rallies behind PM;Nigel Farage puts Reform on ‘general election war footing’ as PM’s premiership on the brink;Nigel Farage launched a scathing attack;The GB News Editorial Charter
